Bank Mandiri Tambah Merchant yang Terima Pembayaran LinkAja
02 Nov 2019, 02:22 by Bisnis.com, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Bank Mandiri dan PT Fintek Karya Nusantara (Finarya) meningkatkan kerja sama dengan menambah lagi merchant yang menerima pembayaran non tunai LinkAja.
Direktur Bisnis dan Jaringan Bank Mandiri Hery Gunardi mengatakan, sinergi antar-BUMN ini diwujudkan dalam bentuk penerimaan pembayaran LinkAja pada merchant Mandiri di berbagai lini usaha. Kini, layanan pembayaran via Bank Mandiri di Bukalapak dan Blibli; Citilink dan Dwidaya; KFC, Chatime, Upnormal Group, dan Hoka-Hoka Bento dapat dilakukan dengan LinkAja.
Selain itu, merchant Bank Mandiri di Taman Safari Indonesia; department store yakni Ramayana dan Sarinah; Health & Beauty yakni Watsons, Gramedia; peritel yakni Jumpstart & Caffe Pierro – Vending Mesin Kopi, Astragraphia – Vending Mesin Printer, Smart Locker, ABN – Vending Mesin Sosro dan Pocari Sweat T1, serta T2 Bandara juga bisa dengan LinkAja. Mandiri juga menggelar program promosi untuk merchant yang menerima transaksi menggunakan LinkAja.
Hal ini akan melengkapi kerja sama berupa fitur top up saldo Mandiri e-money dan updatesaldo e-money pada aplikasi LinkAja yang telah dimulai sejak September 2019.
“Seiring dengan semangat BUMN Hadir Untuk Negeri, kami berharap kerja sama ini dapat memberikan nilai tambah yang optimal kepada kedua belah pihak, termasuk merchantrekanan Bank Mandiri dan masyarakat umum pengguna Mandiri e-money,” papar Hery, Jumat 1 November 2019.

Bank Mandiri Adds Merchants that Receive LinkAja Payments
02 Nov 2019, 02:22 by Bisnis.com, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Bank Mandiri and PT Fintek Karya Nusantara (Finarya) are increasing cooperation by adding more merchants who receive LinkAja non-cash payments.
Bank Mandiri Business and Network Director Hery Gunardi said the synergy between SOEs was realized in the form of receiving LinkAja payments at Mandiri merchants in various business lines. Now, payment services via Bank Mandiri in Bukalapak and Blibli; Citilink and Dwidaya; KFC, Chatime, Upnormal Group, and Hoka-Hoka Bento can be done with LinkAja.
In addition, Bank Mandiri merchants in Taman Safari Indonesia; department stores namely Ramayana and Sarinah; Health & Beauty namely Watsons, Gramedia; Retailers namely Jumpstart & Caffe Pierro - Coffee Vending Machines, Astragraphia - Vending Printer Machines, Smart Lockers, ABN - Sosro and Pocari Sweat T1 Vending Machines, and Airport T2 can also be with LinkAja. Mandiri also holds a promotion program for merchants who accept transactions using LinkAja.
This will complement the collaboration in the form of Mandiri e-money balance top up and e-money updates on the LinkAja application, which began in September 2019.
"In line with the spirit of BUMN Present for the Country, we hope this cooperation can provide optimal added value to both parties, including Bank Mandiri merchants and the general public of Mandiri e-money users," said Hery, Friday 1 November 2019.
